text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump You're a moron. Telling people that Covid-19 can be defeated by injection disinfectant or bleach. Using ultraviolet light inside the body. Honestly, what kind of idiot are you? Then lying about it the day after. Bold face lie is what you told! How many Americans have you killed?
